title: Soup and Go
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Italian, Western, Buffet, Salad bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. This buffet-style place offers basically soups and salads. Each day three soups are usually available, at least one is marked as vegetarian (but most of the time is actually vegan). Ingredients are clearly indicated. The salad buffet includes a selection of fresh vegetables, beans, and grains. Dessert and pies are usually vegetarian but not vegan, fresh fruit is usually available for dessert. Soups include traditional Italian recipes as well as from other countries.
